person.persName: Fleming Bates (Wayne County, Kentucky, saddler, sheriff, & farmer)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, saddler, sheriff, and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret E. Emerson Bates in Wayne County on June 7, 1847. Married to Nancy "Nanie" A. Bates. Father of Mary J. Bates, James T. Bates, Ellis W. Bates, Ann M. Bates, Nancy "Nannie" Bell Bates, and Josiah F. Bates. Saddler in Wayne County in 1850. Sheriff of Wayne County in 1860. Farmer in Wayne County in 1863.
